1248:8: iha hi dharmajñādaparama navaśeṣajñamanicchannapi kumārilo dharmajña eva kevale pratiṣiddhe vedamupādeyamabhimanyamānaḥ paṭhati
1248:13: yaḥ pramāṇamasāviṣṭo na tu sarvasya vedakaḥ || ityādi ||
1248:19: yathoktābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāśvāmī caturāryasatyaviṣayā ākārā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ |
1248:21: saṃkalparūḍhānāṃ caturāryasatyākārāṇāṃ cetoguṇatvamātrasya ca hetoḥ pratyātmavedyatvāt |
1248:23: tathā hi saṃsārasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhātiśayamapanetumiyaṃ saṃkalpārūḍhā caturāryasatyākārabhāvanā prārabdhā |
1248:57: duḥkhe viparyāsatṛṣṇāpravṛtiśaktikarmabhiḥ sahitasyātmadṛṣṭilakṣaṇasya hetoḥ sāṃsārikapañcaskandhalakṣaṇakāryānyathānupapattito niścayāt | yadāhuḥ
1248:72: yo hi yatsvabhāvastasmin svabhāve vyavasthito na saṃskāramapekṣate |
1248:75: pratiṣedhyasya tatsvabhāvatvasya yadvyāpakaṃ saṃskāranirapekṣatvaṃ tadviruddhaṃ tadapekṣatvamiti cittasya doṣātmakatvakṣatiḥ ||
1248:95: tathāpī dṛśo'bhyāso na kasya cid dṝśyata iti cet |
1248:103: abhyāsasahitaceto guṇasphuṭapratibhāsayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorghaṭakumbhakārayoriva sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhāvabhyāsasahitacetoguṇatvasya sādhanasya sphuṭapratibhāsakaraṇayogyatayā vyāptisiddheḥ |
1248:104: tathā hi vyāptyadhikaraṇe kāmāturavartini yuvatyākāre sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāt pūrvamanupalabdhiḥ sphuṭābhasya |
1248:109: tasya parokṣatvena tatpratibaddhaliṅgā niścayāt kiṃ ca sarvajñasattāsādhane sarvo heturna trayīṃ doṣajātimatipatati |
1248:113: api ca abhyāsāt kāraṇātkāryasya sphuṭābhasya pratītau nāvaśyaṃ kāraṇāni kāryavanti bhavantītyanaikāntikatā |
1248:124: tathāpi kaḥ prastāvaḥ sarvajñavivāde sādhanamārabdhavataḥ sphuṭatvaṃ cetasaḥ sādhayitum ||
1248:125: kiṃ ca prasiddhānumāne bhūtalasya dharmiṇaḥ kumbhakāraghaṭayorapi dharmayoḥ pratītatvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvo grahītuṃ śakyata eva |
1248:126: prastute tu kāmāturasantānavartino yuvatyākārasya dharmiṇastatpragatābhyāsasphuṭatvayorapi dharmayoḥ parokṣatvāt |
1248:128: yathā ca naiyāyikaṃ prati yuṣmābhirucyate pratyakṣato na kāryamātraṃ puruṣavyāptaṃ sidhyati |
1248:129: kiṃ tvavāntarameva ghaṭajātīyaṃ kāryamiti tathā nākāramātramabhyāsapūrvakaṃ sidhyati |
1248:133: kiṃ ca sarvavido'pi yadi caturāryasatyaparijñānataḥ sarvajñatāsthitiḥ,
1248:134: tarhi ghaṭādikatipayavastujñāne'pi sarvajñateti sādhvī śuddhiḥ | api ca
1248:143: kintu caturāryasatyākārasvarūpe dharmiṇi sphuṭābhatvasya sādhyasyāyogavyavacchedārthaṃ parvate'gnimātrāyogavyavacchedavat |
1248:149: tadatrābhyāsasahitacaturāryasatyākāraḥ samagro dharmī sāmagryamabhyāsaviśiṣṭacetoguṇatvamātraṃ hetuḥ sphuṭībhāvayogyatāsādhyam |
1248:152: tasmāt sphuṭābhatvena sādhyena dṛṣṭānte vyāptisiddherastyeva tatpratibaddhaliṅganiścayaḥ |
1248:156: iyaṃ ca na gamayatu nāmaikāntataḥ kāryasattvam |
1248:158: tadā bhāvini kārye sandehe'pi kāraṇayogyatā niścīyata eva |
1248:162: atrāpi kāminyākāre bhāvanājātīyasya sphuṭībhāvakaraṇayogyatā dṛṣṭeti samānam |
1248:171: tathā hi kāminyabhyāsasantatisahacāri saṃbhramakāyavacodarśanameva kāminyākārasya tadbhāvanāyāśca darśanam |
1248:176: anyathā cityacaityarūparasagandhasparśaparamāṇupuñjādyātmakasya kumbhakāraghaṭapradeśāderapi rūpaikadeśagrāhakaṃ cakṣuḥpratyakṣaṃ na samudāyavyavasthāpakamiti sarvavyāvahārikapramāṇocchedaprasaṅgaḥ |
1248:177: tathā bāhyaghaṭakāminyādīnāṃ śaktikṛtasya mahato jātibhedasya saṃbhavādanyajātīyavyāptigrahe'nyajātīyād buddhimadanumānamayuktam |
1248:178: saṃkalpārūḍhānāṃ tu jalajvalanayuvatyākārādīnāṃ bāhyatvenādhyastānāmapi vijñānaikasvarūpatayaikajātīyatvamastīti bhāvanāsahitākāramātreṇaiva vaiśadyavyāptirastu ||
1248:181: dṛśyate hi siddhasādhyā vaiśadyajātiranapekṣya viparītabhāvanāṃ nidrāvicchede vicchidyamānā |
1248:182: bhāvanābhāvinī tu na vinā vipakṣābhyāsaṃ jāgrato'pi yadāhuḥ
1248:189: ddhīyet yadi ko doṣaḥ so'pi sarvajñatāṃ vrajet |
1248:193: tathā sattāmātre vipratipannān prati sattaiva kevalā prasādhitā |
1248:194: viśeṣajijñāsāyāṃ tu pramāṇopapannakṣaṇikanairātmyavādina eva sugatasya bhagavataḥ sarvajñatā |
1248:196: sugato yadi sarvajñaḥ kapilo neti kā pramā |
1248:197: athobhāvapi sarvajñau matabhedaḥ kathaṃ tayoḥ || iti ||
1248:203: iti viśeṣasiddhirapyanavadyeti sarvamanākulamākulādhayaḥ pare na pratipadyante |
1248:205: bādhakapramāṇasadbhāvāt sarvajñasyāsadvyavahāro yuktaḥ sadvyavahārapratiṣedho vā prasādhakapramāṇābhāvādveti ||
1248:206: atra vicāryate kiṃ punarasya bhagavato bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ śabdādikaṃ veti vikalpāḥ ||
1248:208: pratyakṣaṃ hi kevalapradeśādau pravartamānaṃ svapravṛttiyogyameva tatra vastu pratiṣedhati |
1248:212: syādetat | na vayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravartamānamabhāvaṃ sādhayatīti brūmaḥ |
1248:215: tathā hi yatra vastuni pratyakṣasya nivṛttistasyāsadbhāvaḥ |
1248:217: yatra tu pratyakṣasya pravṝttistasya sadbhāvo yathā ghaṭādeḥ |
1248:230: tathā hi nivṛttāt pratyakṣādabhāvasiddhirityasataḥ pratyakṣādityuktaṃ bhavati |
1248:233: na hi tacca nāsti tena ca pratipattiriti nyāyyam |
1248:239: na ca dṛśyānupalambhaḥ tatprabhedo vā kāryānupalabdhyādiryogyānupalambho vā parābhimato'tra pramāṇam |
1248:242: tathā hi tatkāraṇamindriyavijñānaṃ vā mānasaṃ vā bhāvanābalajaṃ vā |
1248:252: nūnaṃ sa cakṣuṣā sarvān rasādīn pratipadyate||
1248:272: yadi nāmaikaikenendriyeṇa tajjñānena vā sarvasyāgrahaṇaṃ tathāpi pañcabhirindriyaistajjñānairvā svasvaviṣayapravṛttairevātiśayaprāptairbhaviṣyatīti |
1248:275: tadevamindriyamindriyavijñānaṃ vā nāśeṣagrāhīti na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ ||
1248:277: tathā hi yadyapi tanmānasaṃ sarvārthaviṣayaṃ tathāpi na tasya svātantryeṇārthagrahaṇe vyāpāro'sti|
1248:281: pāratantrye cendriyajñānaparigṛhītārthaviṣayatvādatītānāgatadūrasūkṣmavyavahitaparacittāderarthasyendriyaparijñānāgocarasya manasā paricchedo na prāpnotīti kathaṃ sarvajñatā ||
1248:282: na ca bhāvanābalajaṃ sarvārthagrāhīti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ |
1248:283: tathā hi tadbhāvanābalajamapi yadīndriyāśritamiti caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ,
1248:286: atha bhāvanābalena tathāvidhamutpannaṃ manovijñānaṃ sarvārthagrāhīti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ |
1248:287: tadānvarthatvāt pratyakṣaśabdasya tasya ca bhāvanābalāvalambino'pyanakṣajatvāt nārthasākṣātkāritvamastīti pratipādanīyam |
1248:295: prājño'pi ca naraḥ sūkṣmānarthān draṣṭuṃ kṣamo'pi san |
1248:328: dhyeya ātmā prabhuryo'sau hṛdi dīpa iva sthitaḥ |
1248:334: te ca tata eva siddhe iti vyarthā bhāvanā |
1248:337: atha vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvādāgamānāṃ pramāṇamāgamo na veti vicikitsamāno bhāvanayā jijñāsate |
1248:347: yāvadeva hi gṛhītaṃ tāvadeva bhāvanayā viṣayīkriyate |
1248:361: tadviṣayaśca samastavastunairātmyamiti tadbhāvanāprakarṣaḥ samastavastunairātmyaṃ viśadayan samastavastuviśadatāmantareṇa tadanupapatteḥ samastavastuvaiśadyamāvahatītyuktam |
1248:364: tathā hi nāgamānumānagocaratvaṃ nirātmanāṃ vastubhedānāṃ paramārthasatām |
1248:367: tadagrāhyamapi svalakṣaṇaṃ tadadhyavaseyatayā tadviṣaya iti tadyonirapi bhāvanā tadviṣayeti tatprakarṣastadvaiśadyaheturiti cet |
1248:370: tathā hi yadanumānena gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve apyanyanivṛttī, na vastunī |
1248:375: karikumbhakaṭhorakucakalaśahāriṇi hariṇaśāvalolalocane campakadalāvadātagātralate lāvaṇyasarasi nirantaralagnalalitadoḥkandalīmūla māliṅganamaṅgane preyasitare prayaccha |
1248:378: asti ca vikalpāvikalpayoḥ kathañcit samānaviṣayateti nātiprasaṅga iti cet |
1248:385: vijñānasvalakṣaṇaikatvābhyupagame ca tannityamekamadvitīyaṃ brahmābhyasanīyamiti kṣaṇikanairātmyābhyāsābhyupagamo dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta |
1248:392: tataścānumānamutpannamiti pāramparyeṇa vahnipratibandhāt prāpakaṃ ca vahnerdāhapākakāriṇaḥ tathedamapi anumānajanitabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ pāramparyeṇārthaprasūta tayā tadavyabhicāraniyamāttatra pramāṇamiti |
1248:393: tat kimanumānena vahniṃ vyavasthāpya bhāvayato yadvahniviṣayamativiśadavijñānaṃ tatpramāṇamiti |
1248:394: omiti brubāṇasya parvatanitambārohaṇe satīndriyasannikarṣajanmano dahanavijñānasya bhāvanādhipatya viśadābhavijñānena saha saṃvādaniyamaprasaṅgaḥ |
1248:396: lakṣaṇayogini ca vyabhicārasaṃbhave tallakṣaṇameva bādhitamiti viśadābhamapi prātibhamiva saṃśayākrāntamapramāṇam |
1248:401: tathā ca tadutpatteḥ tadavyabhicāraniyama iti cet |
1248:405: na khalvindhanaviśeṣo dhūmaheturiti vināpi dahanaṃ sahasreṇāpi saṃskārairdhūbhamādhate |
1248:407: bhāvanāyāśca bhūtārthāyā arthānapekṣāyā eva viśadavijñānajananasāmarthyamupalabdha kāmāturādivartinyā iti bhūtārthāpi tannirapekṣaiva samartheti nārthasyālambanapratyayatvaṃ śakyāvagamam |
1248:408: api ca ālambanapratyayā api ta evāsya kṣaṇā yujyante,
1248:409: ye tasya purastāttanā avyavadhānāstathā ca ta evāsya grāhyā na punaḥ pūrvatarāḥ |
1248:411: atha dṛśyamānā dhātutrayaparyāpannāḥ prāṇabhṛto janmāntaraparivartopāttātītānāgataskandhakadambakopādānopādeyātmāna iti taddarśanaṃ dṛśyamānatādātmyena tadviśeṣaṇatayātītānāgatamapi gocarayati |
1248:414: tasya ca bhagavato nirmṛṣṭanikhilakleśopakleśamalaṃ vijñānamanāvaraṇaṃ paritaḥ pradyotamāna mālambanapratyayaṃ sarvākāraṃ gocarayet |
1248:415: tasya ca sākṣāt paramparayā ca kathañcit sarveṇa saṃbandhād deśkālaviprakīrṇavastumātraviśiṣṭasvabhāvatayā tathaiva gocarayet |
1248:416: na caitat sarvagrahaṇamantareṇeti sarvaviṣayamasya vijñānamanāvaraṇaṃ siddham |
1248:419: tathā hīyamālambanapratyayasya sarvaviśiṣṭātmatā bhāvikī na vā |
1248:425: tathā ca na saṃbandha iti na tadgrahaṇe sarvagrahaṇam |
1248:426: vikalpāropitatayā tvavikalpakaṃ samastavastuviṣayaṃ sarvatra pratīyata iti subhāṣitam |
1248:430: iti cet | atha katipayavastvālambanānubhavasya kutastya eṣa mahimā yataḥ samastavastvavasāya iti |
1248:435: tattvāvarakatā hi sulabhamalānāṃ kleśādīnāṃ na punarvikalpanirmāṇapratibandhatā |
1248:442: anumitabhāvitavahniviṣayaviśadābhajñāna prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt tadvidhasya kvacid bādhadarśanādaprāmāṇyamihāpi samānam |
1248:444: tadiha yadi viśadābhavijñānahetutvaṃ bhāvanāyā viśeṣaṇatrayayogena sādhyate,
1248:450: atha pratyakṣavijñānahetutā bhāvanāyāḥ paraṃ pratyasiddhā sādhyate,
1248:459: bhūtārthatve'pi hi buddheḥ tatpakṣapātitā bhūtārthaiḥ pratipakṣairbādho na bhavet |
1248:463: yayā samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitā doṣā na punarudbhaviṣyanti |
1248:464: ataevāsthirāśrayatve'pi apunaryatnāpekṣatve'pi asya nātyantikī niṣṭhā saṃbhavati |
1248:480: iti | tadasya prāmāṇyaṃ nivartamānaṃ tulyahetujatvamapi nivartayati |
1248:481: na caiṣa bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajo'nindriyasannikṛṣṭānumitabhāvitavahnivaiśadye ca nirātmakasamastavastuvaiśadye ca viśiṣyate |
1248:484: kiṃ tu tadākṣiptamanā vividhaviṣayabhedatṛṣṇādiparipluto na śaknoti bbāvayitumiti bhāvanādaramātra eva tadvirahopayogaḥ |
1248:485: asti cehāpi śiśirabharasaṃbhṛta jaḍimamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasyānumitavahnibhāvanābhiyoga iti na hetu bhedataḥ pratibandhasiddhiḥ |
1248:490: kāraṇasāmarthyaprakrameṇa ca pārthivāvayavini kārye jāyata iti avadātam |
1248:504: atrocyate | mārgastāvat pramāṇapariśuddho na bhavatītyuktaṃ prāk |
1248:506: api ca pramāṇapariśuddhamārgavādo śākyaḥ pramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ san satvākhyaliṅgajaṃ vikalpaṃ brūyāt |
1248:509: tasmiṃśca bhāvyamāne sattve bhāvakasya vikalpakasya bhāvanopahite viśadābhatve śabdasaṃsṛṣṭagrāhyanimittaṃ vikalpakatvaṃ nivartate |
1248:515: na cānyasmin śabdasaṃsṛṣṭe bhāvyamāne sphuṭamanyadrūpaṃ bhavati |
1248:517: kṣaṇikatve bhāvye samāropite vāstavaṃ kṣaṇikatvameva yogivijñānapratibhāsīti cet |
1248:521: tasmādabhūtaviṣayābhyāsaṃ nirvikalpakamapi saṃvādānna pramāṇamiti na sarvajñasiddhiḥ |
1248:522: api ca bhāvyasya vastunaḥ punaḥ punaścetasi niveśanamabhyāsaḥ |
1248:523: sa ca brahmacaryeṇa tapasā sādaraṃ dīrghakālaṃ nirantaramāsevito dṛḍhabhūmirasphuṭākārasya vikalpasya sphuṭābhatvajanana iṣṭaḥ |
1248:525: tathā hi bhāvyagrāhī yādṛśo vikalpa utpannastādṛśa eva niranvayaṃ nirudhyate |
1248:526: tasmiṃśca niruddhe punaḥ punarutpadyamānaḥ pratyayastādṛśa evāpūrva utpadyate |
1248:527: tadanena paryāyeṇa kalpasahasre'pi apūrvotpatteraviśeṣānna tajjanyaḥ saṃskāro'bhyāsa utpadyate |
1248:529: niranvayaniruddhaṃ hi pūrvapūrvavijñānaṃ kathamuttarottarāvasthāntaraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ janayet |
1248:530: sarvathā kramabhāvibhiḥ pratyayairavasthitameva rūpaṃ śakyaṃ saṃskartum |
1248:532: tasmāt pratyāvṛttibhāvyavastupratyayajaḥ saṃskāro vyutthānapratyayasaṃskāravirodhī yasyāsti tasyaivātmanaḥ prakṛṣṭo'pi bhāvyasākṣātkāripratyayaheturitiyuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ |
1248:536: tathā hi yadi sākāraṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ svapratibhāsaniyatatvāt ekāgrameva tat kathaṃ vikṣipyate |
1248:537: atha nirākāraṃ tathāpi vikalpakaṃ prati vikalpyaṃ bhinnameva |
1248:541: sarvathā nāsti kṣaṇikavādināmekamanekārthamavasthitaṃ cittaṃ yadekāgraṃ kartumiṣyate |
1248:542: tadevamabhyāsānupapatterasarvajñavatyāṃ cittasantatau na ca vijñānaviśeṣaḥ sarvajñaḥ sidhyatīti ||
1248:544: sarvajñānānāṃ nirālambanatve saṃvedanamātratve ca yogītarapratyayayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ |
1248:548: na hi svātmamātravedanena caturāryasatyādikaṃ sākṣātkṛtamiti yuktamatiprasaṅgāt |
1248:571: pratyakṣeṇāpi cakṣurdahanādikaṃ gṛhītvā bhāvanāprakarṣaparyante jātaṃ sthirataraṃ tadākāravijñānaṃ syāt,
1248:573: astaṃ gataśca tadviṣayo'vasthāntaraprāpto veti kathaṃ pramāṇopanītavastugocaratve'pi saṃvādāśvāsaḥ |
1248:574: api ca yadā hālika eva havyāśanamanumāya bhāvanayā sphuṭayet,
1248:577: abhedapakṣe na yogijñānaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇa bhinnamindriyajñānenaiva saṃgrahāt |
1248:587: tāmantareṇāpi sākṣāt kriyālābhe ca bhāvanāvaiyarthyamiti kāraṇābhāvādeva sarvajñapratihatiḥ ||
1248:589: yattāvat sarvapadārthasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ kimindriyajñānamityādi valgitaṃ tatra bhāvanābalajaṃ manovijñānameva sarvapadārthagrāhīti pañcama evāsmākaṃ pakṣaḥ |
1248:595: tathā hi pratyakṣaśabdasya tāvadakṣāśritatvaṃ vyutpattinimittamarthasākṣātkāritvaṃ tu pravṛttinimittamiti pratipāditam |
1248:597: yathā hi cakṣrurindriyaṃ svasāmarthyānatikrameṇa yogyadeśasthamarthamapekṣya svavijñānajanane pravartate,
1248:598: tathā sarvāvidyāparipanthibhūtārthabhāvanāsahitaṃ mana indriyamapi yogyadeśasthamarthaṃ prāpya svavijñānajanane pravartiṣyate |
1248:604: tadavasthāyāṃ tu śrutinayanayoriva manaso'pi kiyaddūreṇa viṣayasannidhivyavasthitika eva pramātuṃ kṣamaḥ |
1248:606: yāvattena śakyamadhigantuṃ svākārārpaṇasamartha sahakāri vastu tāvaditarajanāsādhāraṇaṃ truṭyadrūpatayā tasya gocarībhavatīti |
1248:607: ata evārthākāro vastuto na bhāvanāmātrajanita iti na visaṃvādaśaṅkāpi |
1248:608: bhāvanayā punastadīyasantāne netra ivāñjanaviśeṣeṇa śaktiratiśayavatī kācidarpitā yatparajanāsādhāraṇadarśanamasya |
1248:614: api ca, arthasya hi ālambanapratyayatvamindriyāpekṣatvena vyāptam |
1248:616: na khalvindhanaviśeṣo dhūmaheturiti vināpi dahanaṃ sahasreṇāpi saṃskārairdhūmamādhatte |
1248:618: na ca bhāvanābalena kasyacidatīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vā dṛṣṭamiti cet |
1248:633: sati ca vyāptiśaithilye śaṅkāpi nyāyādāpatantī kena pratihanyate |
1248:636: ataḥ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāśikākārasya vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiśca vācaspateḥ sandigdhavyatirekitvādanaikāntikī |
1248:639: prasiddhānumānasya ca na kṣatirdṛśyatvopādherdhūmādeḥ pratyakṣānupalambhato vyāptigrahaṇāvirodhāt |
1248:643: na catīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vādarśane'pi niṣeddhuṃ śakyate,
1248:646: kāraṇābhāvo'pi adarśanamātrato na sidhyatīti tadavasthaḥ paribhavaḥ ||
1248:653: na ca caturāryasatyasvarūpe vastutattve niścite sākṣātkāramantareṇa kleśajñeyāvaraṇakṣatiriti svārthamapi tāvad bhāvanā yuktimatī |
1248:654: tattvasākṣātkāriṇi ca cittasantāne sati śakyasākṣātkriyamidamityanye'pi niścayānantaraṃ sākṣātkriyāyai pravartyante,
1248:655: tadupadiṣṭa svargasādhanaṃ cārthabhāvanayānusarantīti svargāpavargalakṣaṇaparārthasiddhaye ca bhāvanā saphaleti |
1248:656: anyathā tattvāsākṣātkāriṇo lokānatikrāntasya vacanamanādeyameva syāditi kva parārthavārtāpi |
1248:657: yacca kiṃ ca tatpramāṇamityādyārabhya tasmād bhūtamabhūtaṃ veti etatparyantena dharmādharmayoranumānāpravartanamuktam,
1248:660: tadā tasya pratyakṣeṇāniścaye'pi yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalena vyāptisaṃvedanaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhanāvasare vyavasthāpitam |
1248:669: anumānena caikavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭe vastutattve'vasite'pi sarvātmanā spaṣṭavastutattvasākṣātkāri pratyakṣaṃ na gṛhītagrāhi,
1248:671: na ca taduttarakālamityādi tu kāraṇānupalabdhidūṣaṇaprastāve prativyūḍhamiti |
1248:672: yadapi vācaspatinā satyamityādinā punaḥ punaruttarottaramāśaṅkaya tat kimanumānena vahni vyavasthāpyetyādinā bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve visaṃvādamupadarśyopasaṃhṛtam,
1248:676: tathā hyayaṃ vahniviṣayenumānapūrvakabhāvanābalataḥ spaṣṭavahnipratyayaḥ kiṃ vahnerapyutpannaḥ,
1248:678: prathamapakṣe visaṃvādaśca bahulamupalabhyate iti yaduktaṃ taddurbhāṣitam |
1248:680: dvitīyapakṣe tu bhāvanāprakarṣamātrajasyārthādanutpannasya bahulaṃ visaṃvādopalambhe'pi bhāvanārthābhyāṃ sākṣādutpannasya yogipratyakṣasyāpi visaṃvādasaṃbhava iti sthavīyasī bhrāntiḥ |
1248:687: na hi vayaṃ pramāṇadṛṣṭavastubhāvanāsahitaṃ mana indriyamarthasvarūpagrāhijñānaṃ janayatīti brūmaḥ,
1248:697: purastāttu bhāvite parisphurati tadarthāpekṣayā bhrāntiḥ prāsarpakasyevetyādyupahāsyamapyasya kṣatātmano durnītipūtigavībhakṣaṇādhmātajaradgomāyorudgāra iva satāmasahyaḥ |
1248:703: tathā, api cālambanapratyayā api ta eva yujyanta ityādirna punarvikalpanirmāṇapratibandhateti paryanto vyarthaḥ |
1248:714: ata eva kāminīpratibhāsasyāpramāṇatve'pyapratyakṣatve'pi sphuṭābhatvasya sādhyadharmasāmānyasya saṃbhavāt na viruddho hetuḥ |
1248:731: bhavatu vā, tathāpi yogijñānasya tena saha tulyahetutvamasiddham |
1248:733: yogijñānaṃ tu avidyāpratipakṣasarvavastutattvabhāvanāviṣayābhyāmutpannamiti mahāntamapi viśeṣamasau durmatiprapātapatito nāvagāhata ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ ||
1248:734: nyāyaprakīrṇe tu mārgastāvat pramāṇapariśuddho na bhavatītyuktaṃ yat,
1248:736: yaccāpi cetyādyārabhya yogijñānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ prasaktamityuktam tatra keyaṃ nirviṣayatā nāma |
1248:749: vyāvahārikasya sphuṭībhāvo'pi bahirabhimatasya paryante vikalpopādeyakṣaṇasyaiva sphuṭasyodayaḥ |
1248:750: tāvataiva sa viṣayastena sākṣātkṛta iti vyavahāraḥ kevalamarthādapyutpattau |
1248:757: etena yat pāramārthikamityādi na sarvajñasiddhiritiparyantaṃ pratyuktam |
1248:758: yaccāpi cetyādi na yuktaṃ paśyāma itiparyantena dūṣaṇamuktam,
1248:760: tathā hi yādṛśa eva bhāvyagrāhī pratyayaḥ prathamo niranvayo niruddhastādṛśa evāpara utpadyata iti niyamaniścayakāraṇaṃ na kiñcidasti caṇḍadevatāsparśādanyat,
1248:762: nanu kṣaṇikatvaṃ sthāyitayā virudhyate na visadṛśotpādena,
1248:763: taddhi prācīnaṃ niranvayanirodhe yathā sadṛśakṣaṇāntaramārabhate tathā svahetugatasāmarthyayogāt kāryotpādānumeyād yadi viśeṣaleśaviśiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇāntaramutpādayati,
1248:765: na hi bhavata iva bhāvasyāpi kṣaṇikatāyāṃ pradveṣo nāma |
1248:789: tathā hi caturāryasatyasākṣātkāraprāptau nirāvaraṇāntaḥ karaṇasya kāruṇyātiśayāt sarvākāraparārthaparatayā sakalagocaracāriṇi cetasi ciravirūḍhotsāhasya tādṛgupāyaviśeṣādhigamo bhaviṣyati,
1248:802: atha svarūpasannihitaṃ jñānameva tadākāramiti nirālambanaṃ niyamena |
1248:812: jñānamātrasya tu tattvataḥ sphuraṇācca na vartamānatāprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ |
1248:813: tathā kṣaṇikatvapakṣe'pi ekatvādhyāropasāmarthyānna vyavahārikaṃ prati pramāṇasya kācit kṣatiriti śāstre prapañcitam |
1248:814: yadapi kiñcedamapi vaktumucitamityādyārabhya bhāvanābalajasyānumānapūrvakatve'pi pratyakṣapūrvakatve'pi vyabhicārābhidhānam,
1248:821: na deśakālavastuviśeṣamapāsya sāmānyena sarvadikkālavartivastumātraṃ kṣaṇikanirātmakamityaniścaye mahāprayāsasādhyapuruṣāyuṣavyāpinyāṃ bhāvanāyāmeva pravṛtterabhāvāt |
1248:822: na ca hāliko havyāśanamanumāya sphuṭīkarotiyena pratyakṣāntaratvaprasaṅgaḥ |
1248:828: sādhyatayaiva tādṝgdaśāviśeṣasya lokātikrāntātiśayasya paramapuruṣārtharūpasya sādhanaviśeṣapratipādanāya pṛthagjanasādhāraṇendriyajñānād bhedena nirdeśāt |
1248:829: paramapuruṣārthaviṣayatvābhāvādeva ca rasāyanādisaṃskārajasyāpi jñānasya na pratyakṣāntaratā |
1248:831: indriyajñānenāpi vastu sarvātmanā gṛhṇatā truṭyadrūpasyaiva grahaṇāt |
1248:832: adhyavasāyo hi pūrvaṃ durllabhaḥ idānīṃ tu bhāvanābalanirdalitāvidye cittasantāne so'pīndriyajñānena janyata iti viśeṣaḥ |
1248:833: nanu yogino manovijñānendriyajñānābhyāṃ paśyata ākāradvayasphuraṇaprasaṅga iti cet |
1248:836: atastāvākārāvapratimau kayā gatyā sphuarata iti ko nirṇetuṃ kṣamaḥ | yadāha
1248:838: sarvathā tu na yogijñānasya kṣatiriti siddham |
1248:840: nanu yadi nāma yuṣmadabhimatasyānumānasya na bādhakam,
1248:852: nihantuṃ hetavaḥ śaktāḥ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati ||
1248:855: sadbhāvavāraṇe śaktaṃ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati ||
1248:856: atrocyate | kimete jñeyatvādayaḥ sarvajñatvena sākṣādviruddhāḥ paramparayā vā |
1248:858: sa ca sākṣād virodha parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇo vā,
1248:870: yasya hyavikalakāraṇasya bhavato yatsannidhānādabhāvastayoreva sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo virodhaḥ |
1248:871: na ca sarvajñatvaṃ prāk pravṛttamavikalakāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena paścājjñeyatvādisadbhāve nivartata iti syāt |
1248:872: tathātve sati deśādiniṣedya eva bhavenna tu sarvathoccheda iti |
1248:874: sa hi bhavan niṣedhyasya sarvajñatvasya vyāpakaviruddhatvāt,
1248:892: yathā māyākāro nirmitāśvādiviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ nirviṣayatvena niścinvannabhrāntaḥ,
1248:894: tathā bhagavānapi śuddhalaukikavikalpasammukhībhāve'pi na bhrānto nāpi pṛthagjanasamāna iti |
1248:904: vikalpenaikasya kasyacidāmukhīkṛtvopadeśe'pi nirvikalpena sarvamavabudhyamānasya vacanānāṃ sarvajñabhāṣitatvādeva ||
1248:920: viśvāsaśca na tāsu syātkenaitāḥ kīrtitā iti ||
1248:921: kinnu buddhapraṇītāḥ syuḥ kiṃ vā brāhyaṇavañcakaiḥ |
1248:927: atha vā yathā cakrasyoparate'pi daṇḍapreraṇāvyāpāre pūrvāvegavaśād bhramaṇam |
1248:928: evaṃ bhagavati pratyastamitasamastavikalpajāle'pi sthite yadi pūrvapraṇidhānāhitasatatānābhogavāhinī deśanā syāttadā ko virodhaḥ |
1248:932: tasmād yathā pūrvābhyāsato jhaṭiti prabodhitasyāriṇā prahārādidānenānurūpa eva prakramaḥ śastroddharaṇādikaḥ,
1248:937: yatpunaruktam piśācādikṛtaśaṅkayā nātrāśvāsaḥ satāṃ yukta iti |
1248:947: taccet krīḍanaśīlānāṃ rakṣasāṃ vā vaco bhavet |
1248:959: tadetad vyāpakaviruddhakāryabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ sarvajñābhāvaṃ sādhayati paramparayā viruddhatvāditi cet |
1248:972: tataśca viśiṣṭavyavahārasya sāṃkaryeṇa na tatraikāntena rāgānumānaṃ yujyate |
1248:974: asaṃmukhībhūtarāgādayo'pi hi svābhimatadevatāstutividhāne mātrādigurujanasaṃbhāṣaṇādau ca vacanamātramuccārayantaḥ samupalabhyante |
1248:975: na ca yadyadabhāve bhavati tasya tatkāryatocyate,
1248:982: yadi kāraṇaguṇādisakalatadanyakāraṇabhāve'pi rāgādi yogyatā'bhāvānnotpadyate vacanamiti sidhyettasyāḥ kāraṇatvam |
1248:997: kāruṇikasyāpi niṣphalārambho na yukta iti cet |
1248:1001: nanu nirvikalpasya bhagavataḥ kathaṃ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ karuṇāsaṃbhavaḥ |
1248:1003: tataśca kāraṇābhāvāt kathaṃ kāryasaṃbhava iti cet |
1248:1010: utpāde tu phalasya hetuniyamo no tu prabandhasthitau
1248:1015: nanu yadi nāmaivaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvena sahāviruddhaṃ dehendriyabuddhyādiyogitvaṃ tu viruddhameva |
1248:1019: dehādīnāṃ hetutve'pi naiṣāṃ kevalānāṃ sahakārimātrāṇāmātmābhiniveśalakṣaṇopādānakāraṇavikalānāṃ rāgādijanakatvamityagamakā eva dehādayaḥ sarvajñābhāvasya |
1248:1022: tathā hi yadyapi teṣāṃ sati prāmāṇye'numāna evāntarbhāvaḥ,
1248:1026: na ca vaidikaṃ kiñcidvacanaṃ sarvanarāsarvajñatvapratipādaka mupalabhyate |
1248:1027: pratyuta nimittanāmni śākhāntare sphuṭatarameva sarvajñaḥ pratipāditaḥ | tathā hi
1248:1028: sa vetti viśvaṃ na ca tasya vettā
1248:1031: tathā hi smaryamāṇameva gavādivastu purovartigavayādisādṛśyopādhi gavādyupādhi vā sādṛśyamupamānena pratīyata iti sthitiḥ |
1248:1032: na ca sarvajñasantānavartīni cetāṃsi kenacit sarvajñenānubhūtāni yataḥ smaraṇena viṣayīkriyeran,
1248:1041: yato dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā'rtho'nyathā nopapadyata iti adṛṣṭārthaṃparikalpanamarthāpattirucyate |
1248:1042: na cāsarvajñatvamantareṇa sarvanareṣu kaścidartho dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā nopapadyate yatastadarthāpattyā parikalpyeta |
1248:1050: tathā hi yathā saṃsārasyānāditve pūrvapūrvavastusattāyā anavadhitvaṃ tathā sarvajñajñānasyāpi pūrvapūrvavastusattāvyāpakatvenānavadhiprasaratā iti |
1248:1063: yacca na kiñcit tatkathaṃ prameyaṃ paricchindyāt,
1248:1079: kiṃ ca, kaḥ punarayaṃ pramāṇābhāvo'bhimato bhavatām |
1248:1087: nanu tathāpi sadvyavahārārthaṃ sādhakamapyasya na vidyate |
1248:1088: tathā hi sarvavido'tīndriyatvāt na tāvadasmadādipratyakṣamasya sādhakam |
1248:1090: na cāyaṃ kālāntare'bhūditi ca kalpanā yujyate |
1248:1091: yathā hi kālatvādidānīntanakālavaditi anenānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate,
1248:1100: kiṃ ca sarvajñasattāsādhane sarvo hetuḥ trayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātivartate asiddhatvaṃ viruddhatvamanaikāntikatvaṃ ceti |
1248:1101: tathā hi sarvajñe dharmiṇi kriyamāṇe na taddharmo hetuḥ siddhaḥ |
1248:1110: dṛṣṭo na caikadeśo'sti liṅgaṃ yo vānumāpayet | iti ||
1248:1113: tatra pauruṣeyopyāgamaḥ tadīyo vā tatra pramāṇam,
1248:1120: kiṃ ca sarvajñapraṇītādvacanāt sarvajñasiddhau kimaparāddhaṃ svavacanena yenāto'pyasau na gamyeta |
1248:1132: na cāpyevaṃ paro nityaḥ śakyo labdhumihāgamaḥ |
1248:1134: āgamasya ca nityatve siddhe tatkalpanā vṛthā |
1248:1148: dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho'nyathā nopapadyate iti adṝṣṭārthaparikalpanamarthāpattilakṣaṇam |
1248:1149: na cātra pramāṇapratītaṃ kiñcid vastvasti yatsarvajñamantareṇānupapadyamānaṃ tatsattāmupanayet |
1248:1154: yadapīdaṃ kārikābṛhaṭṭīkayorekaṣaṣṭyā ślokaiḥ sarvajñasiddhaye bauddhasya sādhanamāśaṅkaya dūṣitaṃ tadapi ghṛṇākaramiti granthavistarabhayānna likhitam |
1248:1155: tathā hyetāni kila saugataiḥ sarvajñasādhanāya sādhanānyabhidhīyante sarvajño'stīti satyam,
1248:1163: tadevaṃ sarvathā sarvajñasādhakapramāṇāsabhavādayukto bauddhānāṃ sarvajñe sadvyavahāra iti ||
1248:1181: ayaṃ ca bhāṣyakārīyaḥ sarvasarvajñaprasādhakaprayogaḥ paṇḍitajitāribhiḥ prapañcita iti tata eva pracayato'badhārya iti |
